metadata.title: CVE-2023-4233 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ofono, an Open Source Telephony on Linux. A stackoverflow bug is triggered within the sms_decode_address_field() functionduring the SMS PDU decoding. It is assumed that the attack scenario isaccessible from a compromised modem, a malicious base station, or just SMS.

criterions.comment: ofono package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
